definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji

sentences.english: The hospital managed by state - owned enterprise which was large - middle type was a products of planning economics.
sentences.chinese: 國有大中型企業辦醫院是計劃經濟的產物。

sentences.english: Natural economy and planned economy can't bring about constitutionalism.
sentences.chinese: 自然經濟和計劃經濟不可能產生憲政。

sentences.english: Chinatex was a product of planned economy.
sentences.chinese: 中紡是計劃經濟的產物。

sentences.english: The doctrine of ultra vires in China is rooted in its planned economy ideology.
sentences.chinese: 中國的越權原則根植於計劃經濟的意識形態中。

sentences.english: Chen Yun is the first person who puts forward theory about planned economy and market regulation.
sentences.chinese: 陳雲是提出計劃經濟與市場調節相結合理論的第一人。

sentences.english: The combination of planning and market regulation will be continued.
sentences.chinese: 以後還是計劃經濟與市場調節相結合。

sentences.english: Regional cooperation is a non-plan economy conception.
sentences.chinese: 區域合作本來就是一個非計劃經濟的概念。

sentences.english: From a planned economy to a socialist market economy.
sentences.chinese: 從計劃經濟到社會主義市場經濟。

definition: highest common factor HCF/greatest common divisor GCD

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 te4 se4 she4 hui4 zhu3 yi4
